metadata.title: CVE-2023-51781 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.6.8. atalk_ioctl innet/appletalk/ddp.c has a use-after-free because of an atalk_recvmsg racecondition.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
